data.prayer: Father, convict the 162,473 believers in Alajuela to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Alajuela, Costa Rica
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Alajuela to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 684,498 people in the state of Alajuela who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Alajuela. Through your servants plant 177 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jew, Spanish-speaking people might believe through him.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Alajuela who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Alajuela to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Alajuela, Costa Rica from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

location.name: Alajuela
location.cities_list: San José, Quesada, Desamparados, Naranjo, San Ramón
location.cities_list_w_pop: San José (31,430), Quesada (27,310), Desamparados (14,448), Naranjo (11,853), San Ramón (10,765)
